subject: Re: Help: Perl Module Installation Issue(s)
body:
On 4/27/07, Jefferson Kirkland  wrote:

> Running make for O/OE/OESI/OpenSSL-0.09.tar.gz

You seem to be trying to install version 0.09 of a module. Version
numbers below 1.0 are pre-releases, by convention, and may not be
finished. Have you read that module's README file?

    http://search.cpan.org/src/OESI/OpenSSL-0.09/README

I'm not sure what you're trying to do, but there may be a better
module available on CPAN. Good luck with it!

--Tom Phoenix
Stonehenge Perl Training

--
